resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

Hi there! Welcome to PITAHC Herbal Plant Detector Application\nPlease click the arrow below to read the instructions to follow that been given by the developers for the effective use of this application in detecting herbal plants...
Instruction 1:\n\nThe leave(s), branch with leaves or whole plant(s) should face the back camera of your device.
Instruction 2:\n\nIts shape should fit in the camera view.
Instruction 3:\n\nThe distance of the leave(s), branch with leaves or whole plant(s) from the camera should be enough, not too far and not too close.
Instruction 4:\n\nTo navigate other features of the application just click the button at the bottom right of the screen .

Thank you for reading the instructions!\n We hope that this application will be of great help to all, Click the information icon at the top right corner of your screen to read this instruction again...
